SUBSCRIPTIONS.TITLE: Subscriptions - User Profile - Taiga
SUBSCRIPTIONS.PLAN_STARTING: Free until April 30th, 2016 - Billing starts May 1st, 2016
SUBSCRIPTIONS.PRIVATE_PROJECTS_LIMIT: Up to {{number}} private projects + Unlimited public projects!
SUBSCRIPTIONS.MEMBERS_LIMIT: Up to {{number}} members per private project!
SUBSCRIPTIONS.CONTACT_SUBSCRIBE: Subscribe to this plan by contacting us at support@taiga.io
SUBSCRIPTIONS.MAX_PRIVATE_PROJECTS: Would you like to make room for more private projects? Upgrade your plan!

HELP.WHY: Why do we think this might be the best plan for you?
HELP.NO_PROJECTS: You currently have no private projects so we believe that the  {{name}} plan might work great for you.
HELP.FEW_PROJECTS: You currently have {{private_num}} private projects so we believe that the {{name}} plan might work just fine for you.
HELP.NUM_PROJECTS: Since you currently have {{private_num}} private projects and {{public_num}} public projects we believe that the {{plan}} plan might be your best option.
HELP.NUM_PROJECTS_CUSTOM: Since you currently have {{private_num}} private projects and {{public_num}} public projects we believe that the Custom plan might be your best option.
HELP.SUBSCRIBE: No matter which plan you subscribe to, you will continue to have full access to all of your projects for free until April 30th 2016.
HELP.UPGRADE: Making changes to your current plan is easy and can be done at any time!
HELP.ACTIVATION: No matter which plan you subscribe to, you will continue to have full access to all of your projects for free until April 30th 2016. If you plan to have more than 1 private project by then please ensure you have selected an approrpiate payment plan before that date.
HELP.PAYMENT: If you have more than 1 private project and you haven't yet subscribed to a payment plan, your private projects will be temporarily blocked. You don't need to worry, they will not be deleted. Once you confirm a subscription plan, they will become accesible again.
HELP.PUBLIC: Please remember that public projects don't count towards paid plans.

PAYMENT_HISTORY.TITLE: Payment History
PAYMENT_HISTORY.CHANGE_DATA_SUCCESS: Wonderful, you've sucessfully changed your payment details

PLANS_SELECTOR.TITLE: Which plan works best for you?
PLANS_SELECTOR.CONTACT: If you think you might need more than 25 members on any given project, we have custom plans that will do the trick. Simply contact us at support@taiga.io

DOWNGRADE.TITLE: Downgrade
DOWNGRADE.REASON: Unfortunately, you seem to exceed the maximum number of private projects allowed by this plan. The selected plan allows up to {{projects}} private projects and {{members}} members per private project. In order to change to the {{plan}} plan you simply have to make the following changes
DOWNGRADE.MORE_PROJECTS: If you have more than {{projects}} private projects
DOWNGRADE.MORE_PROJECTS_OPTION1: Have a maximum of {{projects}} private projects and set the remaining projects as public
DOWNGRADE.MORE_PROJECTS_OPTION2: Keep {{projects}} private projects and delete the remaining private projects
DOWNGRADE.MORE_PROJECTS_OPTION3: Or a combination of the above options
DOWNGRADE.MORE_MEMBERS: If you have more than {{members}} members per private project
DOWNGRADE.MORE_MEMBERS_OPTION1: Have a maximum of {{members}} members for all your private projects

SELECT_PLAN.TITLE: Subscribe to a Plan
SELECT_PLAN.SUBTITLE: You will not be charged for more than one private project until April, 30th.
SELECT_PLAN.INTERVAL: Starting from April 30th, 2016 How would you like to be charged?
SELECT_PLAN.TAXES: Depending on your country, there could be additional taxes
SELECT_PLAN.SUCCESS: Congratulations, you subscribed a plan successfully!

BLOCKED_PROJECT.ITS_ONLY_TEMPORAL: Don't worry, it should be temporary
BLOCKED_PROJECT.TO_UNBLOCK_CHECK_YOUR_PLAN: Unblocking your projects requires that you first subscribe to a plan that makes room for them
BLOCKED_PROJECT.TO_UNBLOCK_CONTACT_SUPPORT: Unblocking your projects requires that you contact with support@taiga.io

PROJECT_RESTRICTIONS.PROJECT_MEMBERS_DESC: The project you are trying to import has {{members}} members, unfortunately, your current setup allows for a maximum of {{max_memberships}} members per project. If you would like to have that limit raised please contact with the administrators at support@taiga.io.

PRIVATE_PROJECTS_SPACE.TITLE: Unfortunately you current setup doesn't allow for more private projects
PRIVATE_PROJECTS_SPACE.DESC: The project you are trying to import is private, unfortunately your current setup doesn't allow for more private projects. If you would like to raise that limit, you might want to consider changing your current plan.

PRIVATE_PROJECTS_MEMBERS.TITLE: Your current setup allows for a maximum of {{max_memberships}} members per private project

PRIVATE_PROJECTS_SPACE_MEMBERS.TITLE: Unfortunately your current setup doesn't allow for neither more private projects nor more than  {{max_memberships}} members per private project
PRIVATE_PROJECTS_SPACE_MEMBERS.DESC: Unfortunately, the project that you are trying to import contains more than {{max_memberships}} members, which is you current setup's limit. If you would like to import projects such as this one, you might want to consider changing your current plan.

PROJECT_TRANSFER.CANT_BE_OWNED: At the moment you won't be able to become an owner of a project of this type. If you would like to become the owner of this project please contact the admin staff so they can help you change your account setup
PROJECT_TRANSFER.CANT_BE_OWNED_BY_MEMBERSHIPS: At the moment you won't be able to become an owner of a project of this type. If you would like to become the owner of this project please contact the administrators at support@taiga.io.

MEMBERSHIPS.LIMIT_USERS_WARNING_MESSAGE_FOR_OWNER: This project currently has {{members}} members, which is the maximun you are allowed. If you would like to raise that limit please contact us at support@taiga.io.

CREATE_MEMBER.LIMIT_USERS_WARNING_MESSAGE_FOR_OWNER: This project currently has {{members}} members, which is the maximun you are allowed. If you would like to raise that limit please contact us at support@taiga.io.
